name: Draw a Tree!
description:
Have you ever wanted a game designed only for drawing trees? Are you sick of all of the non-tree software available that doesn't specialize in trees? If so,  Draw a Tree! is the game you've been waiting for. 

"Draw a Tree! changed my life!" - some guy

"I feel like I've become one with nature since I got this game." - another person

"This is more than just a game, it's a lifestyle!" - fellow tree enthusiast 

CONTROLS:

Right click: Green

Left click: Brown

Space: Deforestation 

R: Restart Game

The game will not work unless you have Java.

Draw a Tree! was created for the Processing  Game Jam #2
